title: Huge lags in full screen
body:
Hey,
I really need help. Since the last patch i cant play in full screen anymore. I have huge lags and kind of fram drops. I know that i can switch to boarderless to fix it but somehow its lagging there a bit to. How can i fix this problem?

Thanks

replies.body: It's hard to tell based on this info if you're having fps issues or a network problem.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for these impacted matches for an overview.  Let me know what you find!
